channel.title: Will rep++ Adding a Chop Option
channel.description: So, i'm using a poison ivy bush for ivy, and i added it and everything, BUT it only shows these options when i right click: Inspect, And Guide and walk here examine and cancel. Is there a way to delete inspect and guide, or add "Chop" Or, possibly make it so i can click inspect or guide to chop it down?Thanks again.

item.title: Will rep++ Adding a Chop Option
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

So, i’m using a poison ivy bush for ivy, and i added it and everything, BUT it only shows these options when i right click:
Inspect, And Guide and walk here examine and cancel. Is there a way to delete inspect and guide, or add “Chop”
Or, possibly make it so i can click inspect or guide to chop it down?Thanks again.

Read full topic
